channel.title: recursive puns – deadbadger.net
channel.description: in a state of advanced decomposition

item.title: Stupid posters (again)
item.dc:creator: Dead Badger
item.description: It seems plenty of other people are finding the freaky Met poster campaign disturbing. Firstly, there’s another one I hadn’t seen, if anything even dafter than the first: Hurray, everybody! Let’s start poking through our neighbours’ rubbish and reporting things we don’t understand! It’ll be a blast (boom boom (boom boom)). The internet being the Continue reading →
item.p: It seems plenty of other people are finding the freaky Met poster campaign disturbing. Firstly, there’s another one I hadn’t seen, if anything even dafter than the first: Hurray, everybody! Let’s start poking through our neighbours’ rubbish and reporting things we don’t understand! It’ll be a blast (boom boom (boom boom)). The internet being the Continue reading →
